convertLabels¶

convertLabels uses a dataframe/tibble of name equivalencies and can use it to convert:

  • Tree tip names

  • Names in the column of a dataframe/tibble (e.g. output from getTreeSupport or getTreeClades)

  • Semicolon-delimited clade groups

Function and Arguments¶

Usage:

convertLabels <- function(to_convert,name_df,from,to)

Argument

Description

to_convert

A phylo, multiPhylo, character vector, or list of IDs to convert

name_df

A dataframe/tibble with column names that has the name equivalencies

from

Column name of current IDs [Default: First column]

to

Column name of desired IDs [Default: Second column]

Example Usage¶

# Script: Rboretum/docs/content/Doc_Function_Scripts/convertLabels.R

library(Rboretum)

# Set test data directory
sourceRboretum()
